recommendations.message: Configure actual notification channel credentials in channel configuration files
recommendations.action: Update slack-config.json, email-config.json, and sms-config.json with real credentials

recommendations.message: Set up cron jobs for scheduled monitoring
recommendations.action: Configure cron jobs using the schedules defined in monitoring-config.json
Run manual tests to verify Slack, email, and SMS notifications work correctly
Connect this monitoring system with your existing observability stack
